section.heading: Exemptions—Use of computers or computer components, accessories, software, digital goods, or digital codes donated to schools or colleges

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 82 > Chapter 82.12 > Section 82.12.0284 82.12.0283 << 82.12.0284 >> 82.12.02915 PDF RCW 82.12.0284 Exemptions — Use of computers or computer components, accessories, software, digital goods, or digital codes donated to schools or colleges. The provisions of this chapter do not apply in respect to the use of computers, computer components, computer accessories, computer software, digital goods, or digital codes, irrevocably donated to any public or private nonprofit school or college, as defined under chapter 84.36 RCW, in this state. For purposes of this section, "computer" and "computer software" have the same meaning as in RCW 82.04.215 . [ 2009 c 535 s 617 ; 2007 c 54 s 15 ; 2003 c 168 s 603 ; 1983 1st ex.s. c 55 s 7 .] NOTES: Intent — Construction — 2009 c 535: See notes following RCW 82.04.192 . Severability — 2007 c 54: See note following RCW 82.04.050 . Effective dates — Part headings not law — 2003 c 168: See notes following RCW 82.08.010 . Effective dates — 1983 1st ex.s. c 55: See note following RCW 82.08.010 .
